import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import{notionAPI}from'../services/api';import{PageType}from'../types';import'./PRDReviewPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PRDReviewPage=()=>{// State management
const[prdDocuments,setPrdDocuments]=useState([]);const[selectedPRD,setSelectedPRD]=useState(null);const[localPRDs,setLocalPRDs]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[editorContent,setEditorContent]=useState('');const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[showNewPRDModal,setShowNewPRDModal]=useState(false);const[newPRDTitle,setNewPRDTitle]=useState('');// Load PRDs on component mount
useEffect(()=>{loadPRDs();loadLocalPRDs();},[]);// Load PRDs from Notion
const loadPRDs=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const response=await notionAPI.getPages(PageType.prd,100,0);const prdDocs=response.data.map(page=>({id:page.id.toString(),title:page.title,content:page.content||'',created_at:page.created_at,updated_at:page.updated_at,is_local:false,notion_url:page.notion_url,file_type:'text'}));setPrdDocuments(prdDocs);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to load PRDs:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};// Load local PRDs from localStorage
const loadLocalPRDs=()=>{const stored=localStorage.getItem('local-prds');if(stored){const localPRDs=JSON.parse(stored);setLocalPRDs(localPRDs);}};// Save local PRDs to localStorage
const saveLocalPRDs=useCallback(prds=>{localStorage.setItem('local-prds',JSON.stringify(prds));setLocalPRDs(prds);},[]);// Create new PRD
const createNewPRD=()=>{if(!newPRDTitle.trim())return;const newPRD={id:`local-${Date.now()}`,title:newPRDTitle.trim(),content:'# '+newPRDTitle.trim()+'

const prdDoc={...newPRD,file_type:'markdown'};setSelectedPRD(prdDoc);setEditorContent(newPRD.content);setIsEditing(true);setShowNewPRDModal(false);setNewPRDTitle('');};// Select a PRD document
